column4: just curious, when will maverick be available for upgrade from the update manager?
there is an option to upgrade
but will it happen without doing this? I'm just asking because my parents (in their late 50s, not tech savvy) have ubuntu 10.04 but they in no way want to use the command line
just want to make sure they'll get the prompt for the upgrade sometimes down the line
have them run that one command in a terminal
its not much command line to it
they could also just run that command with alt f
i guess I could do that, but in any case, if you don't' do that command line, you'll never get the upgrade?
thats how it was explained to me
i am tethering on a 50kbs 3g connection
pr0n has no place on ubuntu
the update manager window says it's still a release candidate
